external_building_id.description: Allows an organization to assign an ID to the building for that organization's internal use. This field has no impact within the HES system, except that it can be filtered on in some of the retrieve_* methods.

improvement_installation_start_date.description: The date on which HPwES upgrade installation began, in YYYY-MM-DD format

improvement_installation_completion_date.description: The date on which HPwES upgrade installation was completed, in YYYY-MM-DD format

contractor_zip_code.description: Five-digit postal code of the contractor installing the HPwES upgrades

contractor_business_name.description: The name of the contracting business installing the HPwES upgrades

is_income_eligible_program.description: Whether or not the HPwES upgrades were performed for a homeowner participating in an income-eligible program

comment_api_only.description: Pass through field for use by api users

town_house_walls.description: Which townhouse walls are exposed (only used if shape is town_house)

blower_door_test.description: Was a blower door test performed on this house?

air_sealing_present.description: Has the building been air sealed? (only used if blower_door_test is false)

envelope_leakage.description: Building air leakage measured with a blower door (CFM50) (only used if blower_door_test is true)

zone_roof.description: Inputs about the construction of the roof(s)

roof_absorptance.description: Absorptance of exterior surface (only used if roof_color is cool_color)

ceiling_assembly_code.description: Ceiling construction assembly code (required unless roof_type is cath_ceiling)

zone_skylight.description: Inputs about the skylights on this roof

skylight_method.description: Construction method to use for skylights

skylight_code.description: Assembly code for skylights (only used if skylight_method is code)

skylight_u_value.description: U-value of skylights (Btu/sf-hr-F) (only used if skylight_method is custom)

skylight_shgc.description: Solar heat gain coefficient of skylights (only used if skylight_method is custom)

solar_screen.description: Does this window have a solar screen?

zone_floor.description: Inputs about the construction of the floor(s)

foundation_insulation_level.description: Foundation wall / slab edge insulation R-value (sf-hr-F/Btu)

floor_assembly_code.description: Floor construction assembly code (only used if foundation_type is not slab_on_grade)

wall_construction_same.description: Do all the walls have the same construction?

window_construction_same.description: Do all the windows have the same construction?

zone_wall.description: Inputs about the construction of the walls

zone_window.description: Inputs about the windows on this wall

window_area.description: Area of windows on this wall (square feet)

window_method.description: Construction method to use for this window

window_code.description: assembly code for this window (only used if window_method is code)

window_u_value.description: U-value of this window (Btu/sf-hr-F) (only used if window_method is custom)

window_shgc.description: Solar heat gain coefficient of this window (only used if window_method is custom)

solar_screen.description: Does this window have a solar screen?

hvac_fraction.description: Faction of conditioned floor area served by this system

year.description: Year equipment was manufactured (only used if efficiency_method is shipment_weighted)

efficiency.description: Efficiency of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
AFUE of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
AFUE of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
HSPF of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
COP (ARI-330) of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
Efficiency of heating equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)

year.description: Year equipment was manufactured (only used if efficiency_method is shipment_weighted)

efficiency.description: SEER of cooling equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
EER of cooling equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)
Efficiency of cooling equipment (only used if efficiency_method is user)

efficiency_method.description: Method to determine water heater efficiency

year.description: Year water heater was manufactured (only used if efficiency_method is shipment_weighted)

energy_factor.description: Energy factor of water heater (only used if efficiency_method is user or uef)

system_capacity.description: DC capacity of system (kW) (only used if capacity_known is true)

num_panels.description: Number of panels in the system (only used if capacity_known is false)

hvac.error_msg: The category element can only be set to "combined" if the heating/type is "boiler" and the boiler provides the domestic hot water

allOf.error_msg: "window_u_value" and "window_shgc" are not allowed for zone_wall/side["front"]/zone_window
"window_u_value" and "window_shgc" are not allowed for zone_wall/side["back"]/zone_window
"window_u_value" and "window_shgc" are not allowed for zone_wall/side["right"]/zone_window
"window_u_value" and "window_shgc" are not allowed for zone_wall/side["left"]/zone_window
